attributes.additional_details:
Making others aware of these domestic abusers keeps vulnerable people safe as well as those who may have children or be young themselves.

Especially if the domestic abuser has more than one previous convicition of violence or abuse. It should be made aware by having such a register in place.
attributes.background: Domestic abuse happens far to often to far to many people. Many aren't aware who they are allowing into their lives and their homes before it's to late. Just like a sex offender I think it should be legal to have a register for these domestic abusers.
